txt.en: Somewhere in Maustazg should be some evidence of the Enemy's plans
You have found the Orcs' orders
There is nothing of interest in here
While patrolling the Entwash Vale, the opportunity has arisen to seek the cause of the Orcs' invasion.
While burning the tents of the Orcs at Maustazg, the opportunity has arisen to seek the cause of the Orcs' invasion.\n\nYou should search boxes to find evidence of the source of the Orcs' invasion.
Supply boxes can be found throughout the Orc-camp of Maustazg, east of Eaworth, in the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should search supply boxes for the cause of the Orcs' invasion.

'What is this?'

You hand G贸da the Orcs' orders. As she reads them, her face reddens.

'You are a gullible fool, [placeholder]. These orders are clearly a deception...they infer that the White Hand of Saruman is behind the invasion and that there is a traitor among us. You have wasted my time!'
Supply boxes can be found throughout the Orc-camp of Maustazg, east of Eaworth, in the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should search supply boxes for the cause of the Orcs' invasion.
G贸da is in the Mead Hall of Eaworth, north-west of Maustazg.\n\nYou should bring the Orcs' orders to G贸da.
Bring the Orcs' orders to G贸da at the Mead Hall of Eaworth
